title: ChatInitSettings
description: A collection of settings to start a new chat conversation

chatName.title: Chat name
chatName.description: Name to apply to the chat created

members.title: Chat members
members.description: Contacts to add to the chat

message.title: Initial chat message
message.description: An initial message to post in the chat when created.

options.title: Chat options
options.description: Option settings that affect the creation of the chat

groupRecipients.title: Group recipients option
groupRecipients.description: if false a separate chat will be created for each member

isPublic.title: Public chat option
isPublic.description: if true the room will be visible to everyone in the chat application

allowHistoryBrowsing.title: Allow history browsing option
allowHistoryBrowsing.description: if true members will be allowed to browse past messages

allowMessageCopy.title: Allow message copy option
allowMessageCopy.description: if true members will be allowed to copy/paste messages

allowAddUser.title: All adding users option
allowAddUser.description: if true members will be allowed to add other members to the chat
